name: The Passage (NatBond2012)
description:
a walking simulator horror experience.

The Passage is a horror game that takes you through a variety of environments, as you try to escape from an unseen creature. Interact with the environment and objects found throughout the game world to find your way out and back to your normal life. Was it real, or was it all just in your head? 

my first ever experience of developing a game as an introdution to my university course. I had no previous experience before this project. 

This project was mainly focused on learning how to model and UV.  I was in charge of the design of the second room in the game. 

one of the other devs in my team is itch user 'Anchry'. you should check him out!
